body.p:
Lexington Ky
Feby 3. 1863.
D C. Wickliffe Esqr
Dear Sir,

You have in your possession a petition to the Governor in behalf of Henry Gilbert for the remission of the forfeiture of a bail bond of his brother for $300 -- I have the execution for the amt in my hands against Mr Gilbert & write to request that you will bring that Matter before the Governor at your earliest Convenience & advise me -- I think the case is one for the exerise of the power of the Governor & hope he will so view it,
